verses.name: Jeremiah 30:12
verses.text: For thus saith the Lord, Thy bruise is incurable, and thy wound is grievous.

verses.name: Jeremiah 30:13
verses.text: There is none to plead thy cause, that thou mayest be bound up: thou hast no healing medicines.

verses.name: Jeremiah 30:14
verses.text: All thy lovers have forgotten thee; they seek thee not; for I have wounded thee with the wound of an enemy, with the chastisement of a cruel one, for the multitude of thine iniquity; because thy sins were increased.

verses.name: Jeremiah 30:15
verses.text: Why criest thou for thine affliction? thy sorrow is incurable for the multitude of thine iniquity: because thy sins were increased, I have done these things unto thee.
